solaris: Improve the performance of Storm in the LOP scene viewer by leaving GPU buffers on the GPU. Also, if a render delegate does not provide a depth buffer, don't do depth testing when drawing selection outlines.
sop: Fixed a bug in the Distance from Geometry SOP that could result in incorrect distance measurements when the "refgrouptype" parameter was set to primitives.
unreal: Fixed a rare crash when changing maps with an HDA loaded.
Fixed multi parameter blocks not expanding.
